posts.title: Baby was born
posts.content: Welcoming a new addition to our home!!! Really excited to share this auspecious news with you guys! 👶🐣🍼🤰😎💪💪

posts.title: No more baby posts please 😀
posts.content: Grapevine is turning into a dumping ground for good feeling posts and reused memes. I'm sorry, but I'm taking a stand against it. Jisko jisko mera baat pasand aya, like thoko 👇👇👇

posts.title: GUYS, YOU WON'T BELIEVE WHAT I FOUND...
posts.content: GUYS, have you heard of TikTok? It's this really cutting edge video sharing app with INFINITE CONTENT!!

posts.title: No more clickbait posts please 😀
posts.content: Grapevine is turning into a dumping ground for TikTok evangelism. I'm sorry, but I'm taking a stand against it. Jisko jisko mera baat pasand aya, like thoko 👇👇👇... but in all seriousness, we need to do something about this!

posts.title: Hey guys, how long does it take you to shower on average?
posts.content: Takes around 5 minutes for me, I'm Mr. Flash ⚡⚡.

comments.text: Ya I don't get it, everybody keeps hating on this platform, but it's just a reflection of you as a person, and humanity as a whole. There's nothing inherently wrong with the app itself :O. You can just, yknow ... not use it? Just a thought!
